column5: Golden Horseshoe wimps..wawawambulance..suck it up buttercups, it's winter and Canada on the same channel, we still have 2 feet up here we ca lend ya.

Unfortunately, a 1/4 of the drivers down here have only just recently experienced snow and don't know how to drive in it. Vehicles with low ground clearance weren't meant for winter driving either. That's what I get for letting wifey pick the vehicle.
5 cms in Markham and the whole area moving at 2kms an hour... people are idiots

Naaaaa.. Don't give me that Bruce.. I drove my 1990 T Bird Supercoupe (supercharged V6.. 5 gear manual.. ground effects) all winter long up here for a good six years. It has nothing to do with the vehicles...

Just a heads up.... and be careful of those that forget how to drive when there is a bit of snow on the roads..  http://www.theweathernetwork.com/news/storm_watch_stories3&stormfile=another_snow_storm_aims_for__100111&eccode=WWCAON0011&warningdisplay=ec&warningtype=sw?ref=stormwatch_city   G.
LET IT SNOW LET IT SNOW LET IT SNOW:thumbsup_anim: Its great to have a snow blower and no reason to go anywhere  vance
Send some this way will ya? The trails suck up here this year. I was bouncing of rocks and logs on my fishing outing last Sunday.

Well Dave; The grass is still poking through the snow here in Hamilton. The forecast is for 6" or so, and with the east winds off Lake O, we might get a little more. So, we can't really spare too much, but I'm sure the folks in the Southampton/London/Sarnia area would be willing to share what they have! Your fishing video looked like you had ample at the time,(well done, BTW) I can say that if it was within my power, I'd happily re-program the snow machine to work harder up your way  Good luck on the video
nice! anyone wanna play in the snow, i'll be in Keswick tonight!
i wish we were getting 30 cms! then maybe i could use the sled a bit more this year
Just in time to do donuts in my new truck...
what did you wind up getting Wayne?

I pick it up Thursday as they have to install my electric brake control module. Traded in my 2003.. got $8000 for it (+ the 13% tax savings) so can't complain.. it was starting to rust.. my ABS just started pulsing again last week meaning I need a new speed sensor hub on the other side now.. and the engine has puffed some blue smoke when starting a few times the last couple months.  Picked up a fresh off the delivery truck, came in on Saturday, 2011 F150 4x4 Super Crew XLT with optional chrome grill/boards/wheels package on it.. full tow package (10,000 lbs towing) and the 5.0 Coyote all aluminum V8 engine x 360HP. Paid less for it..almost $10,000 less.. than I paid for my 2003 !! And the best part.. I used Fords money @ 0% financing..

8k for your '03?  that is a decent trade in!!! anything special about it? I have a F150 of the same year.. with 180k on it.. figured it would be worth about 4-5k on a trade in, with no rust on mine  cant wait to see pics of it when you take delivery Wayne!  0% hard to beat that!  G.
Wayne I had you pegged as a doully kind of guy. Glad to see you getting a new truck with a nice trade-in and 0% to boot.  Art
My bro picked up one last week, exactly the same as you. The dealers are giving them away !!

Nothing special G.. was a Super Crew XLT, 4.6lt V8 Triton, box liner, toneau cover, hitch, electric brake module (that they probably didnt' even see or take into consideration), no rips or tears.. 130k.. tires  have about 25K on them... rusting pretty good on the door bottoms.. running board pads held down with elect tape so they don't flap... a few scratches on the right quarter behind the window from sliding my hut up on top of my sled...  0% on F150's is a one month deal at this point on 2011 F150's.. as they were late coming in on the lots.

That is a deal! as we pretty much have the same truck, I have the super cab?(still 4 door) 6' box... minus the hitch (Mine is on the bumper) and the electric brakes..no rips or tears and the body is mint. you have  me thinking now Wayne... I bought my truck outright and dont owe a penny on it.  Mind if I ask what the price on the  new one was out the door? pm me if you want.
Oh no, not another Ford Wayne

I just took a mint ( no rust) 01 f150 with 212000k on it in trade for $7000.  Mind you it's a crew cab 4x4 with the 5.4L.  Its surprising how well the used truck market is holding up considering the good deals on the new ones.
A Warning and a Heads up .......cause its going to  '' SNOW ''

LOL Joey.. you don't miss a beat do you>!??!! That is the only time this truck has ever been boosted (plug in fridge left on while we all gossiped).. and it still has the original battery in it. That's how good this truck has been to me...and why I went with another one.
Better than my Pontiac "Torment", not quite four years old, and, on it's second battery!!!!!!
not sure what Paul's doing in those photos, doesn't he usually hook one side up to his nipples?
Hahahaha, ouch!!!  Well he was in public so......
On the testies Roger.No pussy footing around here.  Yeah them Ferd's are a handsome truck. Guess that's why the wemen drive them here.
This snow sucks....
Niagara is still getting a whomping. Son was fool enough to go to work. Cars in the ditches. Got stuck twice in a couple of blown in streets, but just for a few minutes. We got more than the 15cms.
15 cm... we call that a dusting up here Bruce !
